bilingual.source: She likes to rub her cat's belly.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢摩擦她猫的肚子。

bilingual.source: He used his hand to rub his eyes.
You can use a cloth to rub this stain.
bilingual.target: 你可以用布磨擦这个污渍。

bilingual.source: They rub stones together to make fire.
Rub the stain with a damp cloth to remove it.
bilingual.target: 用湿布摩擦污渍以去除它。

bilingual.source: If you rub the fabric too hard, it might tear.
bilingual.target: 如果你用力摩擦布料，它可能会撕裂。

bilingual.source: The shoes rub against my heels and cause blisters.
bilingual.target: 鞋子摩擦我的脚后跟，导致起水泡。

bilingual.source: Rub the lotion onto your skin to keep it moisturized.
bilingual.target: 将乳液摩擦到皮肤上以保持滋润。

list.abstract: 波鸿鲁尔大学(Ruhr-Universität Bochum；RUB)是位于德国境内北莱茵威斯特法伦州的一所知名的公立综合类研究型大学；属于世界级著名大学。该校建立于1962年，是联邦德国时期成立的第一所大学。波鸿鲁尔大学在德国特别研究领域DFG的排名评选中排名第二，它是德国最大的大学之一，也是德国最重要的研究基金组织德国科学基金会（Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft）的一部分。 在2018年泰晤士报高等教育世界大学排名（The Times Higher Education World University Rankings）中，波鸿鲁尔大学排名世界201-250位，在2017-2018QS世界排名中，鲁尔大学多个学科进入世界前300名，其中矿业工程排名世界46位，哲学世界101-150位，化学学科151-200位，，物理天文世界201-250位，心理学201-250位，自然科排名世界207位，医学251-300位。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to rub something on my chest? Yes. All over it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要帮我在胸口擦东西？是啊，整个胸口都得擦。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine, forget I asked. How was dinner at your mom's? Awful. I had to rub her ointment all over her again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，当我没问，在你妈家吃的晚饭怎么样? 很糟糕，我又得帮她全身擦药膏。

yingyinNormal.en: Rub the top of your head and rub your tummy. Good. Now your hiccups have gone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在按摩肚子的同时挠你的头，很好，你的打嗝治好啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing odd. I just wanted to rub Amy's nose in it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么不妥的，我就拿来让艾米难堪而已。

yingyinNormal.en: I would grab that kid and rub him all over my face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会抓住他的手在我脸上蹭。

yingyinNormal.en: Finding a Boss was easy. But keeping a Boss, therein lies the rub.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找到一个主人很容易，但要留住主人...却是一个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Now what could you rub on your butt that would smell bad? What if Joey were president?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么很臭的东西可以拿来涂？如果乔伊是总统该怎么办？

yingyinNormal.en: And you want to rub my nose in the fact that my contributions are being overlooked again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你又想趁机打击我，我的成就又被无视了吧？

yingyinNormal.en: So, here's the rub. Somehow, we have to have complex astrophysical engineering conversations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，问题就是有时候,，我们总要进行复杂的天体物理工程学交流。

yingyinNormal.en: You know? What you could do is you could rub something that really smells on your butt, all right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以在屁股上涂很臭的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: For a change of pace, head to the Bugis Markets to really rub shoulders with bargain-hunting locals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要转换一下口味，也可以到武吉士市场，这里人群摩肩接踵，并且能让您一试与当地人讲价。

yingyinNormal.en: And after that, I'll make up my own rules of oral hygiene. You know, instead of flossing, I'll rub pudding on my gums.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我编完之后，干脆再自编个口腔卫生规矩好了，例如以后再也不剔牙，而是把布丁涂牙龈上。

yingyinNormal.en: Zoe has her toy monkey. Ou-ou. Emily has her frog. Rub-it. Suzy has her owl. Twit-twoo. And Rebecca has her carrot. Carrot, carrot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佐伊有她的玩具猴。哦哦。艾米丽她的青蛙，摸摸它。苏西带了她的猫头鹰。笨蛋。瑞贝卡带了她的胡萝卜。胡萝卜，胡萝卜。

yingyinNormal.en: And I know a lot of people use bronzer after they've powdered, but I like to put on before because that really doesn't rub off throughout the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道很多人都是在涂粉之后才使用修容粉饼，但是我喜欢在之前使用，因为这样一整天都不会脱妆。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so here's the rub. I've got 1 working Rover, designed to go a max distance 35 km, before the battery has to be recharged at the Hab. That's problem A.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那么问题来了，我有1台能用的火星车，设计最大里程为35公里，使用之前电池要在居住舱充电，这是问题一。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In addition to either eating other animals or their food supply, wild pigs damage habitats by rooting up grasses and <highlight>rubbing</highlight> on trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了吃其他动物或它们的食物供应外，野猪还会通过拔草和在树上摩擦来破坏栖息地。

examination_example.sentence: The way to pay for the groceries was to take off the things: a bottle of <highlight>rubbing</highlight> alcohol (医用酒精).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 付杂费的办法是把东西拿走：一瓶擦拭酒精。

examination_example.sentence: My mother was putting her groceries into shopping bags when a stranger came up to her, handing her the <highlight>rubbing</highlight> alcohol.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我母亲正在把她的食品放进购物袋，这时一个陌生人走过来，递给她擦拭酒精。

examination_example.sentence: "You know," she said, gently <highlight>rubbing</highlight> my back, "If you save up you could buy this yourself. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她温柔地抚摸着我的背，说道，“你知道吗，如果你攒够钱，你自己就可以买这个。”

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么我们不应该揉眼睛？

examination_example.sentence: For example, if you get something in your eyes, don’t start <highlight>rubbing</highlight> (揉) it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，如果你眼睛里有东西，不要揉它

examination_example.sentence: You can improve an ice-cream headache by rapidly <highlight>rubbing</highlight> your tongue across the roof of your mouth to help warm up things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以通过快速地在嘴巴上摩擦舌头来帮助暖和食物，从而改善冰淇淋头痛。
